description:
This is an Ultimate Life Re-Activator Course.

35, 40, 45, 50, 60 – People desperately require Change.

Juvenile aspirations are no longer valid.

Some opportunities are missed.

Whatever is achieved does not seem to be valuable any more. It just does not bring the same level of joy and satisfaction.

Low or no energy or desire to set goals for the future. Where to next?

Next step is to re-activate the reservoir of your inner-potential. You can do it by analyzing what's blocking your way, what's limiting your achievements and by finding your productive techniques.

The Turning Point course is divided into 4 stages:

    - Formation – Where are you today? And Why

    - Feeling happy and the obstacles to it

    - Breakthrough

    - Going from Knowing to Doing

The material you are about to learn is extremely powerful and highly effective. At the end of each Section there will be a space for Reflection and your notes.

Quizzes and Practical exercises will put a smile on your face, help you enjoy this course even more, and make it easier for you to apply the new knowledge into the real life.

This Course is a must have for those who don't want to stop on what's already achieved.

BONUS: Individual, post-course support: 1 week, over email.
title: Turning Point: Reactivate Your Life
